content:
TSMG now has a listserv list (subscribe here — http://www.hl7.org/myhl7/managelistservs.cfm?ref=nav — if you would like call reminder notifications of TSMG conference calls).

The details for this week's regular TSMG meeting are below. Thanks

–––

HL7ListsAdmin@HL7.org to tsmg@lists.hl7.org

This is an automated message serving as a reminder for an upcoming conference call.
To view the latest information for this call on the website, visit http://www.HL7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=58351

Use this link to add this call to Outlook or to another iCal-compatible program: http://www.HL7.org/tools/ical.cfm?concall=58351

Group

TSMG Main Weekly Call
(for Terminology Services Management Group (TSMG))
Requested by McClure MD, Robert
Date / Time:

Call is scheduled for 1.5 hours

Tue Oct 19, 2021 05:00 PM (US Eastern Time, GMT -4 DST)
Please consult http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20211019T1700&p1=784 for your local times.
Call Status

This is a one-time call
Participation Information

Phone Number: +1 770-657-9270
Participant Passcode:

Join Zoom Meeting
